main event: Witness observed a weird-shaped object revolving or rotating for about 30 seconds before rapidly moving to the right.
interesting points: The object was confirmed by radar as a target., The visibility of the object was obscured by fog., The sighting occurred on April 8, 1959 at about 1:30 AM., The object was described as disc-shaped and hovered at 500 feet., The witness had seen a similar flashing object hours earlier.
witness description: Police officer, age 54, experienced in aerial observations.
